about_the_game:
DUNGE is a first person roguelike dungeon crawler, where you can discover uniquely synergising powerups, take on hordes of enemies and fight powerful bosses. Go in alone, or team up with friends in online co-op.

Billions of procedurally generated floors!

More than 50 unique items!

And 7 challenging bosses!

Many years ago, your father, an archaeologist, vanished in a mysterious cave. Driven by a desire for closure, you seek out the very depths that claimed him. Armed with a strange, ancient lamp capable of unleashing powerful energy, you delve into the darkness. Now, you must navigate the cavern's dangers and uncover the truth of your father's disappearance, no matter the cost.

name: DUNGE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: 4-core Intel or Ryzen Processor
  • Memory: 2500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: 8-core Intel or Ryzen Processor
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: For Ultra Graphics and hosting multiplayer lobbies effectively
